mapper.select: select * from user where role = '2' and adcode like concat(#{adcode},'%')
select * from user where role = '3' and adcode like concat(#{adcode},'%')
select * from user where role = '7' and adcode like concat(#{adcode},'%')
select * from device where adcode = #{adcode} and project = #{project} and isManagerAssign = 0 order by id;
